Index >  IfAppendImage

IfAppendImage

Description

Returns or sets whether insert or append new scanned/loaded images.

Data type

bool

Default value

true

Syntax

.IfAppendImage = false;

Remarks

If the value of the property is set to 'true', the new scanned/loaded image will be appended to the last image in buffer;
if it's set to 'false', the image will be inserted before the current image.

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.
